Gabe Mays on Pro Managed WordPress | Let's Be Real with GoDaddy

I've gotta say, this is one of the strongest product launches I've seen here at GoDaddy. I'd encourage all you WordPress gurus out there to give this a shot, and help the team make it better with your feedback.
Happy to share that our new Managed WordPress product launches today!

I'm excited to speak at the Tech Inclusion conference as part of a panel on veteran recruiting, moderated by Ian Faison. In preparation for the event, the organizers asked why I work on this area of Diversity & Inclusion. In short, it's because hiring veterans is great for business. Yet doing it well is both a huge and a solvable challenge. Together with our amazing tech partners and the veterans who give us a shot, BreakLine has proven that when talented folks have the right coaching, network, and access to opportunity, they can jump into a wide range of awesome roles and absolutely fly. That's terrific for veterans and their families, and even better for the companies that hire them. We have made a ton of progress succeeding at this within the tech industry, and we are expanding quickly to meet demand. Because every time a veteran is hired, we all win. #techinclusion
